Class CheckExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • CheckExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExpressionComponents
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Calculator

    public class CheckExpression
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExpressionComponents
    Contains all the necessary methods for working with the elements of the expression: replacement, finding of conformity (определение соответсвия)
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hakop Hakopyan
